mapper.select: SELECT R.PRODUCT_NO, R.BOARD_INDEX, R.M_ID, P.PRO_NAME, R.REVIEW_TITLE, R.REVIEW_CONTENT, R.REVIEW_DATE, R.REVIEW_HIT FROM REVIEW R JOIN PRODUCT P ON R.PRODUCT_NO = P.PRODUCT_NO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW VALUES ( #{M_ID}, #{PRODUCT_NO}, REVIEW_SEQ.nextval, 0, #{REVIEW_TITLE}, #{REVIEW_CONTENT}, NULL, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT PRODUCT_NO from PRODUCT where PRO_NAME = #{product_name}

SELECT R.M_ID as BOARD_WRITER , P.PRODUCT_NO as product_no, R.BOARD_INDEX as board_index,R.REVIEW_HIT as REVIEW_HIT ,R.REVIEW_TITLE as REVIEW_TITLE, R.REVIEW_CONTENT as REVIEW_CONTENT,R.REVIEW_DATE as REVIEW_DATE, p.pro_name as pro_name FROM REVIEW R JOIN PRODUCT P ON R.PRODUCT_NO = P.PRODUCT_NO WHERE BOARD_INDEX = #{BOARD_INDEX}
